communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

FBI Files on Robert E. Basham, a former FBI SA mentioned in several JFK releases: https://www.archives.gov/files/research/jfk/releases/docid-32294746.pdf

I have attached a copy of his church's newsletter indicating he died 10/16/2020. 

As per my understanding of the FBI's FOIA policies, please expand your search to include both main and reference files.

I am making this request in my capacity as a journalist who has written extensively about government transparency, including several books on the FBI specifically. As such, I am not requesting a fee waiver, but I am requesting I be placed in the media requester category.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

JPat Brown

title: Gun acquisitions from 2019 to 2023 (New Hampshire State Police)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Hampshire Right to Know Law, I hereby request the following records:

New , I am requesting an opportunity to inspect or obtain copies of public records of the number of gun licenses that have been given out over the past five years (2019-2023), specifically a breakdown per year, as well as the number of guns police have taken off of the streets over those same years, also broken down by year.
I am requesting that this be sent to me in a searchable, electronic format.
I understand that the Act permits a public body to charge a reasonable copying fee not to exceed the actual cost of reproduction and not including the costs of any search or review of the records. The law allows you to impose a waiver or reduction of fees when information is sought in the public interest, as is the case, to which I am requesting. I am a reporter at The Eagle-Tribune. As a representative of the news media, I am making this request for news gathering purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Katelyn Sahagian

title: Body Camera Footage for the Pizza Hut Fatality

communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: Body Camera Footage for the Pizza Hut Fatality
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide us with the body camera footage obtained on 04/22/2023 from 18.30 to 19.30, from Officer Stribling, A.M 0575, and Mullen, J.A 0470 in regard to case 2023-01913. We are requesting this on behalf of the litigating attorneys in this file.  Let us know if you are able to assist, us or provide us with an explanation of why the footage is not accessible. Thank you.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Steve with Custard Insurance Adjusters
